Key Match Events: Stephen Curry scored the final 12 points for the Warriors to will them to a 120-117 victory over Klay Thompson and the Dallas Mavericks
Klay Thompson tied a season-high with 22 points and six 3-pointers
Pre-Game Insights: The game carried extra significance being the opener of the Emirates NBA Cup
Post-Match Reflections: No post-match comments provided in the article
Miscellaneous Highlights: In his return to the Bay, Thompson was greeted by hundreds of Warriors employees wearing Captain Hats
The Warriors shared their tribute video for the four-time champion, which prompted a standing ovation
Others: The Warriors improved to 3-1 at home on the season

The Warriors have won two of their last three meetings vs. the Mavericks, with all three contests decided by four points-or-less
The Warriors made a season-low 59.3% of their attempts from the free throw line
